review: HeapVR, iki oyun moduna sahip bir blok istifleme deneyimidir. İstediğiniz herhangi bir 3 boyutlu yapıyı oluşturmak için blokları mümkün olduğu kadar yükseğe istifleyin veya blokları gelişigüzel bir şekilde birbirine tutturun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961017729', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3428, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 304, 'last_played': 1709475313}
review: I think it's fare to say a very simple block stacking experience should be packaged as some kind of SDK Example project and not a game on steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1649574826}
review:
HeapVR is barely a game.  It's a VR exclusive block stacking experience.  I think most gamers would probably agree that putting one block on top of another block is not actually a game. 

It's unclear what the purpose of this software is.  Games are supposed to be fun.  Pretending for a moment this is some kind of fun game (it isn't), the technical implementation is abysmally lazy.  Minimalist, untextured low polygon count art assets look ugly and phoned-in.  This "game" seems to have been made VR exclusive for no reason other to prevent comparison with actual games, a comparison where this would fail, badly.  Developers must surely know if the only thing cool about their game is VR, that just means VR is cool, and not their game.

This non-game is really just cluttering up Steam and making it harder for gamers to find genuine, actual video games.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982295752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2097, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1529000437}
review:
HeapVR is a free block stacking game in VR.  It worked on my system.  The only game mode i saw is unlimited stacking where you have a table that is slowly lowering and you have to quickly stack 2 kinds of blocks to keep stacking higher.  There are obstacle blocks at certain distances than you have to build your stack around and over.   Has a leaderboard. 

Try it, for a little challenge.  

For more info:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JCi1lcNUAjU

https://steamdiscovery.com/585270/steamgame/heapvr/

author: {'steamid': '76561198298025584', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 398, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1488259816}
review:
更多VR游戏评测尽在83830

《搭积木》是一款休闲益智游戏，游戏中玩家可以在三种模式中体验搭积木的乐趣。

游戏的画面场景比较简单，不会给玩家带来太多的视觉享受。游戏的玩法也比较单一，通过左右手柄的长方形积木和正方形积木在圆台上不断叠加，不能让搭高的积木倒塌。游戏中一共有三种模式，除了场景简单变化和模式上的条件限制，玩法并没有太大的改变，导致游戏元素过少，缺少令人感兴趣的游戏内容。

游戏在Steam免费上架，仅仅是一款普通的搭积木游戏，如果对这类游戏感兴趣的话，可以自行下载体验。
